meanings.sent1: The nutant tree branches swayed in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent2: The nutant flowers in the garden looked sad in the rain.
meanings.sent3: The nutant umbrella refused to stay upright in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her nutant posture reflected her dejected mood.
meanings.sent5: The nutant willow tree seemed to bow in reverence to nature.

meanings.definition: A plant or flower that is drooping or nodding
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with colorful nutants after the storm.
meanings.sent2: The nutant daisy in the vase brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: The nutant sunflower seemed to be nodding off to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The nutant tulip looked like it was whispering secrets to the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The nutant rose blushed as it drooped under the weight of the morning dew.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is inclined or leaning in a certain direction
meanings.sent1: The nutant in the group always leaned towards adventure.
meanings.sent2: The nutant tower leaned slightly to the left after the earthquake.
meanings.sent3: The nutant book on the shelf seemed eager to fall and be read.
meanings.sent4: The nutant cat stretched lazily against the sun-warmed wall.
meanings.sent5: The nutant ship sailed confidently towards the horizon.
